issue.title: [CI] Homebrew formula is failed by openssl formula name update
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7257](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7257). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://travis-ci.org/ursa-labs/crossbow/builds/616575964#L3501

```

Error: 2 problems in 1 formula detected
apache-arrow:
  * Dependency 'openssl' is an alias; use the canonical name 'openssl@1.1'.
The command "brew audit $ARROW_FORMULA" failed and exited with 1 during .
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7257?focusedCommentId=16982095) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5895
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5895>
